channel.title: The Simple Phaedo on Superphysics: A New Science
channel.description: Recent content in The Simple Phaedo on Superphysics: A New Science

item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: Persons Of The Dialogue: Phaedo, the narrator of the dialogue to Echecrates of Phlius Echecrates Socrates Apollodorus Simmias Cebes Crito Attendant of the Prison Scene The Prison of Socrates Place of Narration Phlius Echecrates: Were you yourself in the prison with Socrates on the day when he drank the poison?
